name: Martin
description: I am a person who is always optimistic and smiling. My communicative character helps me to have many friends but at the end they all turn out to be fake! I had only one good friend who passed away some few years back in Sweden. I am Swedish but been living here in the state since i was 19 Years. I hate lie and betrayal, so I would never be with the person who lies and I personally never cheat on my close people. People who know me say they can easy talk on any topic with me and I am glad they feel that everything I say or do goes from my heart. I am passionate and affectionate – I am sure my future wife will value these features in me.
